languages.text: "Твой кабал разбит и почти изничтожен, Комморра для него — смертельная ловушка. Скажи же, Темный — ты намеренно сманиваешь павшего дракона назад, чтобы иметь разменную монету, когда за твоей головой явятся прихвостни вашего верховного владыки?"

"Your Kabal has been crushed and nearly wiped out completely. Commorragh is a death trap for your kin. So tell me, Dark One, are you purposefully luring the fallen Dracon back so you have something to bargain with when the minions of your supreme overlord come for your head?"
languages.original_text: "Твой кабал разбит и почти изничтожен, Комморра для него — смертельная ловушка. Скажи же, Темный — ты намеренно сманиваешь павшего дракона назад, чтобы иметь разменную монету, когда за твоей головой явятся прихвостни вашего верховного владыки?"

traits.locale_text: "Your Kabal is decimated and nearly wiped out completely. Commorragh is a death trap for your kin. So tell me, Dark One, are you purposefully luring the fallen Dracon back so you can have something to bargain with when the minions of your supreme overlord come for your head?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your Kabal is decimated and nearly wiped out completely. Commorragh is a death trap for your kin. So tell me, Dark One, are you purposefully luring the fallen Dracon back so you can have something to bargain with when the minions of your supreme overlord come for your head?"

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your Kabal has been crushed and nearly wiped out completely. Commorragh is a death trap for your kin. So tell me, Dark One, are you purposefully luring the fallen Dracon back so you have something to bargain with when the minions of your supreme overlord come for your head?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your Kabal has been crushed and nearly wiped out completely. Commorragh is a death trap for your kin. So tell me, Dark One, are you purposefully luring the fallen Dracon back so you have something to bargain with when the minions of your supreme overlord come for your head?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Eure Kabale wurde zerschlagen und nahezu vollständig ausgelöscht. Commorragh ist eine Todesfalle für Euresgleichen. Also sagt, Dunkler, lockt Ihr den gefallen Dracon bewusst zurück? Damit Ihr ein Druckmittel für die Verhandlungen habt, wenn die Schergen Eures Lehnsherren kommen, Euren Kopf zu holen?"
languages.original_text: "Your Kabal has been crushed and nearly wiped out completely. Commorragh is a death trap for your kin. So tell me, Dark One, are you purposefully luring the fallen Dracon back so you have something to bargain with when the minions of your supreme overlord come for your head?"

traits.locale_text: "Eure Kabale wurde zerschlagen und nahezu vollständig ausgelöscht. Commorragh ist eine Todesfalle für Euresgleichen. Also sagt, Dunkler, lockt Ihr den gefallen Dracon bewusst zurück? Damit Ihr ein Druckmittel für die Verhandlungen habt, wenn die Schergen Eures Lehnsherren kommen, Euren Kopf zu holen?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “你的阴谋团几乎已经被彻底摧毁，灰飞烟灭。对你的族人而言，科摩罗无疑是个死亡陷阱。告诉我，黑暗子嗣，你是不是故意把失宠的裁决官引诱回来？这样，当至高霸主的爪牙来取你的项上人头时，你就有了讨价还价的筹码？”
languages.original_text: "Your Kabal has been crushed and nearly wiped out completely. Commorragh is a death trap for your kin. So tell me, Dark One, are you purposefully luring the fallen Dracon back so you have something to bargain with when the minions of your supreme overlord come for your head?"

traits.locale_text: “你的阴谋团几乎已经被彻底摧毁，灰飞烟灭。对你的族人而言，科摩罗无疑是个死亡陷阱。告诉我，黑暗子嗣，你是不是故意把失宠的裁决官引诱回来？这样，当至高霸主的爪牙来取你的项上人头时，你就有了讨价还价的筹码？”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Votre Kabale a été écrasée et presque complètement anéantie. Commorragh est un piège fatal pour les vôtres. Alors dites-moi, Drukhari, vous appâtez délibérément le Dracon déchu pour l'échanger contre votre vie lorsque les sbires de votre suzerain suprême viendront vous chercher ? »
languages.original_text: "Your Kabal has been crushed and nearly wiped out completely. Commorragh is a death trap for your kin. So tell me, Dark One, are you purposefully luring the fallen Dracon back so you have something to bargain with when the minions of your supreme overlord come for your head?"

traits.locale_text: « Votre Kabale a été écrasée et presque complètement anéantie. Commorragh est un piège fatal pour les vôtres. Alors dites-moi, Drukhari, vous appâtez délibérément le Dracon déchu pour l'échanger contre votre vie lorsque les sbires de votre suzerain suprême viendront vous chercher ? »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Tu Kábala ha sido aplastada y casi aniquilada por completo. Commorragh es una trampa mortal para tu gente. Dime, Oscuro, ¿tienes intención de atraer al Dracón caído para tener algo con lo que negociar cuando los esbirros de vuestro señor supremo vengan a por tu cabeza?».
languages.original_text: "Your Kabal has been crushed and nearly wiped out completely. Commorragh is a death trap for your kin. So tell me, Dark One, are you purposefully luring the fallen Dracon back so you have something to bargain with when the minions of your supreme overlord come for your head?"

traits.locale_text: «Tu Kábala ha sido aplastada y casi aniquilada por completo. Commorragh es una trampa mortal para tu gente. Dime, Oscuro, ¿tienes intención de atraer al Dracón caído para tener algo con lo que negociar cuando los esbirros de vuestro señor supremo vengan a por tu cabeza?».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「お前の陰謀団は鎮圧され、ほぼ完全に壊滅した。コモラフはお前の同族にとっては死の罠だ。闇の者よ、お前は目的を持って失墜したドラコンを呼び戻そうとしているが、それは最高統治者の手先が自分の首を狙ってきた時に、何か取引できるものがあるからか？」
languages.original_text: "Your Kabal has been crushed and nearly wiped out completely. Commorragh is a death trap for your kin. So tell me, Dark One, are you purposefully luring the fallen Dracon back so you have something to bargain with when the minions of your supreme overlord come for your head?"

traits.locale_text: 「お前の陰謀団は鎮圧され、ほぼ完全に壊滅した。コモラフはお前の同族にとっては死の罠だ。闇の者よ、お前は目的を持って失墜したドラコンを呼び戻そうとしているが、それは最高統治者の手先が自分の首を狙ってきた時に、何か取引できるものがあるからか？」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Kabal'ın ezildi, tamamen ortadan kaldırılmanın eşiğine geldi. Commorragh, türün için bir ölüm tuzağı. Söyle bana Kara, gözden düşmüş Drakon'u geri getirme sebebin, yüce efendin kelleni almaya geldiğinde elinde pazarlık kozu olmasını istemen mi?"
languages.original_text: "Your Kabal has been crushed and nearly wiped out completely. Commorragh is a death trap for your kin. So tell me, Dark One, are you purposefully luring the fallen Dracon back so you have something to bargain with when the minions of your supreme overlord come for your head?"

traits.locale_text: "Kabal'ın ezildi ve neredeyse tamamen ortadan kaldırıldı. Commorragh türün için bir ölüm tuzağı. Söyle bana Kara, gözden düşmüş Drakon'u geri getirme sebebin, yüce efendin kelleni almaya geldiğinde elinde bir pazarlık kozu olsun istemen mi?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
